keyword: how many calories in a whisky shot
title: How Many Calories in a Whisky Shot?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a whisky shot, including alcohol content, zero carbs, and nutrition breakdowns for standard servings.
h1: How Many Calories in a Whisky Shot?
assumptions: Standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) shot of 80-proof whisky, straight, no mixers or additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by proof, brand, serving size, and any additions; alcohol content affects calorie density. Consult labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A standard whisky shot contains about 97 calories, all from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison; spirits have negligible macros beyond calories.

faqs.q: How many calories in a whisky shot?
faqs.a: Approximately 97 calories for a standard 1.5 oz (44 ml) 80-proof shot.

faqs.q: Does whisky have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No, distilled whisky has 0 g carbs, fiber, and sugars per shot.

faqs.q: How does proof affect calories in whisky?
faqs.a: Higher proof increases calories; 100-proof adds about 25 kcal per shot versus 80-proof.

faqs.q: Are there any nutrients in a whisky shot besides calories?
faqs.a: Minimalâ€”0 g protein, fat, cholesterol, and sodium; calories are purely from alcohol.

faqs.q: What if the whisky shot is mixed?
faqs.a: Mixers like soda or juice add 50+ kcal; stick to straight for lowest calories.
